text:
I usually don't write review. But for this, I would need to shout out to 黄老师 and say a big thank you for her patience and dedication in chinese teaching.

My daughter just gotten her PSLE 2024 result. She scored AL3 for 普华 and Merit for 高华. From a AL 6 or 7 to a AL3 merit, I think that is a great improvement!! From someone that cannot conversed properly in Chinese till able to speak fluently. Don't think this will happen if not for 黄老师 dedication and teaching.

In my daughter owns words: 黄老师 is patience, interesting, most importantly don't make her hate Chinese and always encourages her to improve.

As my daughter move to her next phrase of education journey, I would like to thank 黄老师 for all her great works done!! 谢谢老师！！

My child has been enrolled in PromiseLand for a year and he loves his teacher and lessons. It really makes a great difference when he looks forward to attending his lessons with confidence. Even his Primary school Mother Tongue teacher feedback to us how my child has improved in his participation and school work. My child was even offered to take up Higher Chinese in Primary Three. We want to give credit to his teachers and the cozy and positive environment Promiseland provides for my child’s progress. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

Hang Lao Shi a a super patient and kind teacher who taught both my daughter and son. She also picks suitable Chinese story books to loan my children to encourage reading every week/alternate week (depending on reading speed). She also gives homework to ensure sufficient practices so she could use the lessons to teach. High recommended!

Huang Laoshi has tutored my two elder kids from P5 to P6, and helped both of them them achieve an improvement in their Chinese by 2AL bands. Engaging her for my youngest child as well. The promiseland teaching materials and methods are very effective, and I highly recommend them!

My daughter has been taught by Huang Lao Shi since P3. Her grades has been consistent and scored AL2 for PSLE. Huang Lao Shi is very approachable and responsible. She makes sure her students complete her work.
